<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/big-changes-newsletter-2020?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]> EASy Avionics: Everything You Ever Wanted to Know About Vertical Navigation <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2019/12/easy-avionics?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]> Part 2 - Performance Part Two takes a closer look at performance entries, discussing each input and where the entry impacts the performance in the flight plan...Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2019/12/easy-avionics?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]>
Four Ways our TPE331 Engine Elevates Performance <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/blogs/2019/07/four-ways-our-tpe331-engine-elevates-performance?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]>Honeywell Engines ArticleThe TPE331 continues to set new performance standards for turboprop aircraft engines...Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/blogs/2019/07/four-ways-our-tpe331-engine-elevates-performance?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]>
North Atlantic Operations Update <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2019/12/nao-update?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]>Assigned Speed and Separation ChangesThere have been some significant programs put in place this year for operations in the North Atlantic High-Level Airspace...Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2019/12/nao-update?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]>
Radar Corner <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2019/12/radar-corner?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]> Follow-Up to Understanding Windshear Detection Systems One of the breakthrough moments of forward-looking windshear detection systems was the simple-yet-eloquent definition of F-Factor or Hazard Factor...Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2019/12/radar-corner?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]>
